评论详情: I wore this with a plain black dress to a wedding and got so many, many complements. It was a beautiful nd simple way to dress up a plain outfit. The color was lovely and it seems well made. I like the fact it has sleeves - made it much more comfortable than a shawl.
Love this addition to my wardrobe. Can be worn all year round. Shows off my metal jewelry against the dark background. Everything I hoped for.
This has become one of my favorite things to wear.  It looks expensive and unique.  I get compliments on it everytime I wear it!
Just beautiful. Looks exactly as pictured and is comfortable. Very happy
Perfect weight on shoulders, material is soft and feels like high quality . Tassels are perfect. Size is on point.
The fit is as expected and the color is beautiful.

I am going on a cruise and I wanted something to wear over the black dress that I am packing to dress it up a bit.  This burnout velvet kimono arrived and I tried it on with the dress.  It looks so good.  I have always loved burnout velvet and the burgundy color I chose is just gorgeous.
I’m 5’5” and this just seemed a bit wide for me. I gave it to my sister who is 5’7” and it looks very nice on her.
Pulls outfit together I’m very happy, I bought the blu color stunning, darker cranberry and  green as I was gifting! Very happy with quality, price and fit! Looked amazing over my dress
This cover is beautiful and so soft! I'm 5'3 so it's pretty long on me but I love it!
Very well made. Beautiful color. Overall very satisfied with this purchase.

This might be one of my favorite purchases to date. It is great quality and totally looks like a Free People or vintage piece. I got SO many compliments on it. I've worn it with jeans and a tank as well as leggings and a shirt, this dressed both options up perfectly. Love everything about this. And don't let the shipping time scare you, it showed up much much quicker than originally noted.
Love this soft and beautiful
This is a well made and good quality duster. It is very pretty and came in many colors.
This is a great kimono but in the picture it does appear to have black accents.  The color I purchased does not have any black on it. Good overall quality
Looking forward to wearing this piece. It will really dress up a pair of pants

评论概述: Beautiful color an nice loose fit an flowy!
评论详情: Only that it says to hand wash! I just ordered in the teal an can’t wait to get!
This is beautiful!  The pictures don’t do it justice!
Love everything about this! I will be purchasing more soon!
I wore it to work today, and was getting many compliments throughout the day. High quality. Even better quality and fit than expected. Helping me channel my inner Stevie!!
This product is great. I got it for a Stevie Nicks concert and can’t wait to wear it. It is very pretty and I plan on wearing it even after the concert.

评论概述: It's beautiful but the cut is unflattering
评论详情: I wanted to like this so bad.. I had big plans to make it my summer personality. But something about the cut and the way it falls on me gives more academia graduate and less mysterious boho. It's made beautifully, the velvet is a bit heavier/thicker than I expected
Beautiful and well made luxury.  The color is true to the picture. It's beautiful. Well made. True to size
Good quality and comfortable. The color is also nice.
Love this. That's it. Worth purchasing. Super cute an comfey.

评论概述: DO NOT PUT IN WASHING MACHINE
评论详情: Hand wash and hang dry only, which sadly means this beautiful piece is not very wearable.

I love this burgundy velvet burnout kimono cardigan! It is truly beautiful. I am wearing it over a black velvet top and black velvet pants with black velvet flats. I'm too old to wear high heels, but if you want, go for it. I plan to wear this to a western wedding. We're a little more casual out here, and I think it will be beautiful with the right jewelry. And, if the young ladies say, "Bless her heart!" because I wear pants, who cares. My feet hurt, and I'm too old to care. My granddaughter approves, so there you go. This velvet burnout kimono is a showstopper, believe me! I am excited to wear it! This would also make a nice Christmas outfit for any family gathering! It is festive and lovely. One size fits all!

I absolutely loved the idea of using this as a cardigan top with a long sleeve top to compliment it. I loved how it looked as I paired it with a under shirt and pants. Will definitely purchase this in different colors.
Love this item! Excellent quality and beautiful appearance! Very comfortable.
The color of this kimono is beautiful! It was a great length and light weight. Hopefully the tassels and stitching lasts through the wash.
Absolutely beautiful, I love it. I received so many compliments when I wore it!
I gave it to her for a birthday present after seeing it on her Amazon wishlist. She is quite pleased with it, so I give it a thumbs up.
Nice product for something fun, but you will leave little keepsakes of your tassels wherever you go.
Will wear at upcoming wedding.

Absolutely gorgeous! Looks even better than the photos. I'm a big girl and it's very slimming. I bought 7 different colors and they are worth every penny! I'm very excited about my purchase. Might have to be careful when washing this, as it has the fringe at the bottom.

So pretty!  I love it!!! The delivery driver left my package laying in the middle of my sidewalk.  Thank goodness I saw it before it rained.  Also, I was leaving for vacation.  It would have been there almost a whole week.

I got this to dress up the outfit I wanted to wear for a fancy company party. This is the perfect accessory to dress up an outfit wether it be a dress or a black T-shirt and leggings! The velvet is soft and it is beautifully flowy.

评论概述: Beautiful but get the one WITHOUT the tassels
评论详情: only worn once and already the tassels are falling out, loosely tied and easy to pull even when you're being very careful...I'm disappointed given the price point. If I get any more, I definitely won't be getting the ones with tassels so as not to be frustrated.

I've purchased 2 of these in different colors. They are absolutely beautiful. I'm old school boho and live in kimonos. These are by far the nicest I own. You won't be disappointed. I plan to order more!
I ordered the burgundy and received grey/ivory.  It's pretty, but I really wanted the burgundy.  I guess I'll keep this one and order another.

Thank you to the reviewer who said these are a perfect dupe of the Free People burnout kimono. I was looking for one to wear over my dress to a holiday party and fell in love with the FP version but couldn't justify the price, yet the price on this one was almost too good to be true. I couldn't decide on the color so ended up ordering two (still much cheaper than one from FP): the burgundy and the "rust" which was really a very complementary rose and turquoise color. I would say the burgundy almost leans more plum but looks good with my brown hair and fair complexion. The burgundy arrived wrinkled and without a tag so may have been a return but I can't find any flaw with it. Both are perfect weight so they drape nicely and are a good length. Definitely recommended!

This is a beautiful kimono. I have been dying for the FP Nightbird kimono for months and months, but decided to see if this one was good quality before spending $100. It feels expensive and quality, and there are arm holes which makes the fit a little more flattering. I would absolutely purchase in other colors.
Beautiful, comfortable, and reasonably priced. I will be buying it in more colors!
The quality is really excellent on this. It’s quite lovely, I sometimes even use it as decor
I found the same Kimono on a high end retailer for 3 times the price. The quality is excellent, I get so many compliments evertime I wear it!
I love this wine colored burn out! I will wear it through the holidays. The quality is very good for the money.
Very nice cardigan. I use it to compliment my outfits. Well made and looks fabulous.

This wrap is everything exactly as described, beautiful velvet, mesh sheer between, tasels with a flattering trim. That being said - it is elegant and stunning. I couldn’t be happier - ordering more in other colors!!
Bonne qualité, telle que vue sur la photo, j’adore!

My wife absolutely loves this kimono and would have given it five stars if not for the tassels.  She just received it, opened it only to notice some of the tassels missing or falling off.  Other than that it's absolutely beautiful but considering the cost of it it should be in perfect shape upon receiving it hence the two star rating.
Nice texture , long fringe beautiful

I ordered the burgundy colour and paid for faster shipping, was supposed to arrive Friday with faster shipping but arrived Wednesday! It has sleeves for those wondering and it is absolutely lovely, I’m plus size and have plenty of room! Would Definitely recommend you buy!
Velvet burnout of highest quality, colors fully saturated, fringes are well made.  Gets a ton of compliments and looks a million bucks.
La tela es de buena calidad, el terciopelo se siente súper suave y las costuras son buenas. Es Perfecto !!
